result.reason: WinForms race condition where ProtocolBase.CloseBG disposes InterfaceControl while CreateHandle is in progress on tab close
result.approach: Add try/catch for InvalidOperationException around base.Dispose() in InterfaceControl.Dispose and around Control.Dispose()/InterfaceControl.Dispose() calls in ProtocolBase.DisposeControl/DisposeInterface to gracefully handle the CreateHandle race window
